description_expanded: Air Wick Honeysuckle & Raspberry Plug-In Refills (2ct) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. A 2-count package of scented oil refills for Air Wick Plug-In warmers in the Honeysuckle and Raspberry scent. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
